mapper.insert: insert into todolist(td_no, td_content, user_seq) values(td_seq.NEXTVAL, #{td_content}, #{user_seq})
mapper.select:
select t.td_no , t.td_content , t.td_date , decode(t.complete, 'N', '미달성', 'Y', '달성') as complete , t.user_seq from todolist t , tusers u where 1 = 1 and t.user_seq = u.seq
and td_content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and td_date like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and t.user_seq = ${user_seq} order by td_no desc
select td_no , td_content , td_date , decode(complete, 'N', '미달성', 'Y', '달성') as complete , user_seq from todolist where td_no = #{td_no}
mapper.update: update todolist set td_content = #{td_content} where td_no = #{td_no}
